data.text:

Flash Sale Alert! You can fly as soon as you book from P899 one-way base fare this November #CEBSeatSale happening today till Nov 10! Includes Unli Rebooking, Zero Change Fee. With CEB, you can fly easy for #MoreSmilesAhead! Book NOW at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24. https://t.co/8rS5MvwzNh

Learn more at https://t.co/Qvy2GfkDSs. https://t.co/sRADStDAwb

Make it a November to remember! Book your fave destinations at https://t.co/taKDgpUG24 now til Nov 30, 2021 for as low as P88 one-way base fare in our latest #CEBSeatSale! With Unli Rebooking and no changes fees, you can Fly Easy with CEB for #MoreSmilesAhead https://t.co/sJzLU2F9rb

urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text:
Psst! May #CEBSuperPass ka na? Pwede mo nang i-redeem ‘yan! 

Pwede ring bumili Juan more time, kasi buy all you can! 😉  Last day to avail is on Sep 16, 2021! Get yours now! https://t.co/Ux3oI6kZvn https://t.co/Ak7Lg5g2gX
CEBU na nga ba eh, everyJuan is DAVAO-wowed  to fly with #CEBSuperPass anytime they like until Sep 2022! Pili na ng pupuntahan!

Bet mo ba to fly ANYWHERE in the Philippines ANY time you like? With the #CEBSuperPass, choose from over 30 local destinations from our widest domestic network & fly from Sep 2021 til Sep 2022 for only P99 (one-way base fare) each pass! RT / like the destination you want now! https://t.co/vVIfdHlUjr

data.text: They may select their preferred option (unlimited rebooking, 2-year Travel Fund, or Refund), until 30 days from date of departure, through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website (https://t.co/GAB2WoEUdR).

As such, Cebu Pacific is constrained to cancel the following flights as it tries to appeal the said regulation: 
5J 26 (Manila- Dubai) September 12 
5J 27 (Dubai – Manila) September 13 

Affected passengers have been informed via contact details provided in their bookings.

CEB Advisory on Dubai flights this September  
As of 9PM; September 10, 2021 
 
The Dubai Civil Aviation Authority has restricted the number of passengers for the Dubai-Manila route for the month of September due to regulatory matters. https://t.co/iuWns8oQpk

data.text: As such, Cebu Pacific will continue to operate flights for essential travel during this time.  However, guests who wish to voluntarily postpone their domestic flights until September 15 may select their preferred option:

As of 9:00PM, September 07, 2021 

The Philippine government, through the Inter Agency Task Force (IATF), has retained the Modified Enhanced Community Quarantine (MECQ) status of the National Capital Region (NCR) until September 15, 2021.

#CebAdvisory
CEB Flexible Options due to extended MECQ in the National Capital Region (NCR) https://t.co/sD6Frr8J7o

No matter what, you’ve proven you can fly! Thanks to our 2021 Paralympics Philippine Team! 

To show our appreciation, every Juan on the Para team of the Philippines, athletes and trainers, will receive FREE flights from us!  

Read more: https://t.co/HG6Z7o8o66 https://t.co/3AuZ1zKXNn
